p: In terms of minor adverse events, one case of unpleasant mouth taste (3.12%) and one case of epigastric pain (3.12%) were observed in the intervention group at the beginning of the trial. Postintervention laboratory tests showed no disorder in patients. In control and intervention groups, medicine compliance was more than 80% (full compliance) in 90.6% and 87.5% of patients, respectively.
